resources.string: Designed & Developed by Anil Eknath Dhotre
Disclamer: Live streaming content is provided by Temple Administration. This application is designed for easy, uninterrupted and ad-free provision for live streaming.
Please start live streaming and wait for at least 10 seconds for live streaming to start.
Question: Why does live streaming does not start after pressing play button?
Answer: Sometimes temple live streaming service temporarily goes down, please try to stream later.
Question: Why does it take too long time to load the live media streaming?
Answer: This could be because of one or multiple factors, most common been; temple live streaming service handling high network requests or slow internet connectivity.
Question: Why isn't an option to live stream from Sai Baba Temple, Shirdi or Siddhivinayak Temple, Mumbai temples?
Answer: Live stream from Sai Baba Temple, Shirdi and Siddhivinayak Temple, Mumbai seems to be restricted.
